Shipment to Stormwind

Bring William's Shipment to Morgan Pestle in the Stormwind Trade District.
William's Shipment

Description

My brother Morgan is waiting in Stormwind for my shipment of candles. I don't have enough time to make the trip myself, but if you'd like to take him the shipment, he'll pay you well.

I've packed up the candles, and you can find Morgan in our shop, Pestle's Apothecary, in the Stormwind Trade District.

Reward

You can choose one of these awards:
Explosive Rocket
Oil of Olaf
Elixir of Lion's Strength

Progress

Oh, a shipment from my brother? Splendid! Fortune truly shines on me today!

Completion

Here is your payment ... and while you're here, take a look around! I'm sure we have a potion or other trinket you'd find useful.

Gains

Upon completion of quests, get:
  • 790 Experience
  • 150 Reputation with Stormwind
